name: Tasha's Man Mix
description:
I wanted a model that made nice looking men, with that classic simple, flat, cel-shaded look. So I merged some models and sprinkled in a few LORA, and I'm pretty happy with the result. It makes some nice looking images reminiscent of anime stills and promo art. It also plays well with style LORAs.

No baked in vae, so be sure to use one, any VAE intended for anime will work.

These are just recommendations for generations, but you can always experiment with settings.

CFG: 7-ish

Sampler: Any DDIM++ samplers,

Clip Skip: 2

Steps: 25-30

High Res Fix: On 1.5-2x

Upscaler: R-ERSGAN 4x+ Anime 6B

I highly recommend using a negative embed or LORA intended to fix hands.

meta.prompt: 1boy, (1man), (male:1.2), young, masked face, finely detailed eyes and face, lean, masculine appeal, commanding presence, hot stud, sienna skin__, BuildAMan/1man-poses__, tuxedo, jade eyes, chocolate brown hair, brush cut, informative, wallet,
